channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Live Adoration From Ewtn Chapel
channel.desc: From Our Lady of the Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Scripture And Tradition With Fr. Mitch Pacwa
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch discusses the warning prophecy for the people of Israel who rebel against God by trusting in Egypt?s Pharaoh instead of in God?s perfect timing and means of salvation. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Where God Weeps
channel.desc: Nigeria is a multiparty democracy that has become Africa?s economic and demographic powerhouse. But the country also has a terrorism problem that has grown bigger and more complex. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: World Over
channel.desc: Each week, Raymond Arroyo challenges viewers with important political and cultural reporting and analysis of a wide variety of topics of interest to Catholics and people of faith. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Agony, Scourging, Crowning with Thorns, Carrying the Cross and Crucifixion help us to accept pain and perseverance to the very end. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Finding God In All Things: The Teaching Of Ignatius Loyola On Daily Prayer
channel.desc: Fr. Timothy M. Gallagher, OMV discusses how our prayer should ?turn the chair? so our eyes meet the Lord?s gaze. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Our Father's Plan
channel.desc: In their on-going Bible study series, Dr. Scott Hahn and Jeff Cavins explain how the return of the Israelites from exile was a manifestation of God?s divine plan for His people. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fields And Faith
channel.desc: As the grandson of the great Coach Vince Lombardi, Detroit Lions Offensive Coordinator Joe Lombardi says he's proud to carry on his family?s faith and football legacy. Hosted by Bob Dolan. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: World Over
channel.desc: Each week, Raymond Arroyo challenges viewers with important political and cultural reporting and analysis of a wide variety of topics of interest to Catholics and people of faith. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Alive In Christ The Martyrs Of The Church
channel.desc: When the Eucharist is shown through the eyes of Ignatius of Antioch and Justin Marty, the true meaning is illuminated as they both willingly sacrifice their lives for their Faith. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: My Lourdes Faith Journey
channel.desc: New Orleans native Earl Jones faced a fight for his life during one of the deadliest hurricanes in history. A desperate call out in faith from the midst of the storm led to surprising help from a heavenly friend. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! At Home With Jim And Joy
channel.desc: Jim and Joy continue their discussion with author and Catholic Evangelista, Sonja Corbitt, on her book, emphasizing how the greatest commandment is a key to whole-person healing. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reasons To Believe
channel.desc: Renowned Biblical scholar, Dr. Scott Hahn and co-host Mike Aquilina explain how Jesus founded His Church on earth to guide His followers to the Kingdom. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Finding God In All Things: The Teaching Of Ignatius Loyola On Daily Prayer
channel.desc: Fr. Timothy M. Gallagher, OMV discusses how our prayer should ?turn the chair? so our eyes meet the Lord?s gaze. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News In Depth
channel.desc: EWTN?s weekly one-hour discussion of current events in the Church, politics, and culture, from a Catholic perspective. Covering the underreported stories and clarifying the Church's position on key teachings, with a focus on the laity's needs and concerns. Hosted by Catherine Hadro. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Journey Home
channel.desc: Steve Faulkner, formerly a Non-denominational Christian, explains what drew him to the Catholic Church. Hosted by Marcus Grodi. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Joyful Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (19 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Blessed Virgin Mary
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite this beautiful prayer in honor of the Blessed Virgin Mary from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (11 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Blessed Angelico
channel.desc: A documentary on the life and art of famous Dominican friar and Renaissance painter Fra Angelico. His intricate frescoes depicting salvation history were instrumental in helping people contemplate these mysteries. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Priesthood Of Jesus Christ
channel.desc: Fr. Miller discusses how the priesthood has been attacked during the past 500 years. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer and Doug discuss how the way mud in the area dried up and people as far as 10 miles away viewed the event, disproves the miracle of the sun mass hallucination theory. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Women Of Grace
channel.desc: EWTN favorite Fr. Wade Menezes stops by for an up close and personal profile. He recounts his life growing up on a dairy farm, his desire to be a journalist, and how God?s call led him to becoming a Catholic priest. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Where God Weeps
channel.desc: Nigeria is a multiparty democracy that has become Africa?s economic and demographic powerhouse. But the country also has a terrorism problem that has grown bigger and more complex. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: St. Thomas More: A Hero For Our Times
channel.desc: Dr. Gerard Wegemer of the University of Dallas discusses the life and heroic virtues of St. Thomas More, who gave his life defending the Faith during the reign of Henry VIII. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints And Heroes
channel.desc: Nicholas was still a young boy when he discovered the love of Jesus and the gift of giving that changed the world. Based on historical facts and traditions this film is worth watching with family and friends. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Massterpiece Donut Shop
channel.desc: Join Duncan and The Donut Repair Club is singing along with original songs about the Mass featured on Massterpiece Donut Shoppe. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother discuss's the Trinity and its meaning. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: A Wolf In Sheep?s Clothing
channel.desc: An expos? of the lies and deception spun by 60's radical, Saul Alinsky. His political tactics and theories espoused social justice, but carried an agenda that threatened core beliefs of Christianity and the Church. (90 minutes).
